Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 24, 2026

1. What We Collect

MOMENTUM stores all your personal data locally on your device using AsyncStorage. This includes:

‚Ä¢ Your habits and completion history

‚Ä¢ Energy scores and mood logs

‚Ä¢ App settings and language preferences

We do not transmit or store personal data on our servers.

2. AI Coach (Claude API)

When you use the AI Coach feature, the following anonymous statistical data is sent to Anthropic's API:

‚Ä¢ Your current energy score (number only)

‚Ä¢ Names of your habits (text you entered)

‚Ä¢ Streak counts and completion percentages

No personally identifiable information (name, email, location, device ID) is sent to Anthropic.

Anthropic's privacy policy: anthropic.com/privacy

3. Push Notifications

If you enable reminders, we use Expo's notification service to send local push notifications. No notification data is stored on external servers.

4. Analytics & Crash Reporting

We may use anonymous crash reporting (Expo/Sentry) to identify and fix bugs. This data contains no personal information.

5. Third-Party Services

‚Ä¢ Anthropic (Claude API) ‚Äî AI coaching responses. See their policy at anthropic.com/privacy

‚Ä¢ Expo ‚Äî App framework and notifications. See expo.dev/privacy

‚Ä¢ Google Fonts ‚Äî Font loading. See fonts.google.com

6. Children's Privacy

MOMENTUM is rated 3+ and does not knowingly collect data from children under 13. The app contains no advertising, in-app purchases targeting children, or social features requiring age verification.

7. Data Deletion

To delete all your data, simply uninstall the application. All locally stored data is removed automatically when you uninstall.

8. Contact

Questions about this policy? Contact us at: privacy@momentum-app.dev
